org.svvrl.goal.core.logic.propositional
Class PLBDD

java.lang.Object
  jdd.bdd.NodeTable
      jdd.bdd.BDD
          org.svvrl.goal.core.util.EBDD
              org.svvrl.goal.core.logic.propositional.PLBDD

public class PLBDD
extends EBDD

This class provides a BDD manager for propositional formulae.

Author:
"Ming-Hsien Tsai"

syntacticallyImplies

public static boolean syntacticallyImplies(java.util.Collection<PL> ante,
                                           PL cons)
Returns true if a collection of PL formulae (the antecedent, hold at the same time) syntactically implies a specified PL formula (the consequent). In this method, all the PL formulae will be expanded to basic formulae by the tableau rules. Note that the implication is syntactical, not semantic.

Parameters:
ante - the antecedent
cons - the consequent
Returns:
true if the antecedent syntactically implies the consequent

syntacticallyImplies

public static boolean syntacticallyImplies(java.util.Collection<PL> ante,
                                           java.util.Collection<PL> cons)
Returns true if a collection of PL formulae (the antecedent, hold at the same time) syntactically implies another specified collection of PL formula (the consequent). In this method, all the PL formulae will be expanded to basic formulae by the tableau rules. Note that the implication is syntactical, not semantic.

Parameters:
ante - the antecedent
cons - the consequent
Returns:
true if the antecedent syntactically implies the consequent
